scripts.deploy-main: git add . & git commit & git push origin main & docker build --tag asterisk . & docker image tag asterisk realorangekun/asterisk & docker push realorangekun/asterisk
scripts.push-main: git checkout main & git merge features & git push origin main
scripts.push-features: git add . & git commit & git push origin features
scripts.deploy-features: git add . & git commit & git push origin features & docker build --tag asterisk . & docker image tag asterisk realorangekun/asterisk & docker push realorangekun/asterisk
